location.name: Bakkerij De Gouden Korrel
location.description: A traditional Dutch bakery in the town center

script.situation: At a traditional bakery, a customer buys bread and asks for the price.

dialogue.speaker: Sanne
dialogue.text: Goedemorgen. Ik wil één brood, alstublieft.
dialogue.translation: Good morning. I want one loaf of bread, please.

dialogue.speaker: Jeroen
dialogue.text: Goedemorgen. Wit brood of bruin brood?
dialogue.translation: Good morning. White bread or brown bread?

dialogue.speaker: Sanne
dialogue.text: Bruin brood, alstublieft. Hoeveel kost het?
dialogue.translation: Brown bread, please. How much does it cost?

dialogue.speaker: Jeroen
dialogue.text: Dank u wel. En hier is vijftig cent terug.
dialogue.translation: Thank you. And here is fifty cents back.

questions.question: What kind of bread does Sanne want?
How much does the bread cost?
